availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John J. Rice (Magoffin County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Magoffin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of George W. Rice and Elizabeth Rice. Married to Sarah Rice. Father of Mary E. Rice, George W. Rice, William M. Rice, and Henry C. Rice. Resident of Morgan County in 1850. Farmer in Magoffin County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, p. 166B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Magoffin County, p. 504.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. 376B.
